thread.title: Sri Lanka Tourist Arrivals Jump 31 Pct
thread.title_full: Sri Lanka Tourist Arrivals Jump 31 Pct | Airwise News

author: Reuters
title: Sri Lanka Tourist Arrivals Jump 31 Pct
text:
Tourist arrivals in Sri Lanka jumped 31.2 percent in July, government data showed, with the number of foreign visitors increasing for the 75th straight month since the near three-decade civil war ended in 2009. Monthly arrivals exceeded 100,000 for the 14th consecutive month in July, while the number of foreign visitors rose by 16.8 percent in the first seven months of the year.
Total arrivals hit a record high in 2014, while revenue from the South Asian island nation's leisure sector also peaked last year.
Tourism is one of the main foreign exchange earners for Sri Lanka's USD$78.6 billion economy.
(Reuters)
